name: octo-tree
description: Radial file tree visualization for git repositories.

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test --workspaces --if-present && npm run test:e2e
scripts.profile:screenshot: npm run build && node --inspect packages/cli/dist/index.js screenshot
scripts.profile:video: npm run build && node --inspect packages/cli/dist/index.js video --max-seconds 5 --fps 10
